channel.title: Snakrs as the initiator of the server crash
channel.description:
The server can be crashed if a lot of snarks will be exploded near prop_physics.
Like this: [img='https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/683776078286756310/0CD83AEA4E2BF8B6FB2EAD74477E1D965FB792F1/',left][/img]
